fw.name: CATSmarTeamIntegInterfaces
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

class.name: StiDBChildren
class.abstract: Represents all the Children of a CATIAStiDBItem.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns the <font color="green">CATIAStiDBItem</font> from its index in the CATIAStiDBChildren.

method.name: LinkType
method.abstract: Returns the <font color="green">Link Type</font> from its index in the CATIAStiDBChildren.

method.name: Count
method.abstract: Returns the <font color="green">Number of Children</font> currently gathered in CATIAStiDBChildren.

class.name: StiDBItem
class.abstract: Represents the SmarTeam Integration Object, that is to say the Document coming from SmarTeam database.

method.name: GetChildren
method.abstract: Returns both all the <font color="green">Children</font> of the CATIA Document -associated to the CATIAStiDBItem- and their corresponding <font color="green">Link Types</font> with their Father CATIA Document.

method.name: GetDocument
method.abstract: Returns the <font color="green">CATIA Document</font> associated to the CATIAStiDBItem -the SmarTeam Integration Object.

method.name: GetDocumentFullPath
method.abstract: Returns the <font color="green">Full Path</font> of the CATIA Document associated to the CATIAStiDBItem.

method.name: IsCFOType
method.abstract: Returns if the CATIA Document -associated to the CATIAStiDBItem- is a <font color="green">Component File</font> or not.

method.name: IsRoot
method.abstract: Returns if the CATIA Document -associated to the CATIAStiDBItem- is a <font color="green">Root</font>.

class.name: StiEngine
class.abstract: Represents the SmarTeam Integration Engine, that is to say the entry point to the CATIA/SmarTeam Integration.

method.name: BuildDocDBItemFromSmarTeamID
method.abstract: <font color="green">Copys the SmarTeam object -and its children- to default Work directory</font>, opens it into CATIA session and returns the corresponding CATIAStiDBItem.

method.name: BuildFileDBItemFromSmarTeamID
method.abstract: <font color="green">Copys the SmarTeam object -and its children- to default Work directory</font> and returns the corresponding CATIAStiDBItem, Without opening the file into CATIA session.

method.name: Connect
method.abstract: <font color="green">Connects to SmarTeam Integration</font>.

method.name: Disconnect
method.abstract: <font color="green">Disconnects to SmarTeam Integration</font>.

method.name: GetSMARTEAMClassID
method.abstract: Returns the <font color="green">Class Identifier</font> of a SmarTeam Integration Object <font color="green">CATIAStiDBItem</font> -at least saved in SmarTeam.

method.name: GetSMARTEAMObjectID
method.abstract: Returns the <font color="green">Object Identifier</font> of a SmarTeam Integration Object <font color="green">CATIAStiDBItem</font> -at least saved in SmarTeam.

method.name: GetStiDBItemFromAnyObject
method.abstract: Returns the SmarTeam Integration Object <font color="green">CATIAStiDBItem</font> from an <font color="green">AnyObject</font> object.

method.name: GetStiDBItemFromCATBSTR
method.abstract: Returns the SmarTeam Integration Object <font color="green">CATIAStiDBItem</font> from a <font color="green">Full Path</font>.

method.name: GetTeamPDMURL
method.abstract: Returns the <font color="green">Team PDM URL</font> of a CATIAStiDBItem.

method.name: IsConnected
method.abstract: Returns if end user <font color="green">Is Connected to SmarTeam Integration</font> (True) or not (False).

method.name: LifeCycleCheckIn
method.abstract: <font color="green">Checks the CATIAStiDBItem Into SmarTeam Check-In Vault</font>.

method.name: LifeCycleCheckOut
method.abstract: <font color="green">Checks Out Without Propagation</font> the CATIAStiDBItem in SmarTeam.

method.name: LifeCycleCheckOutPropagated
method.abstract: <font color="green">Checks Out With Propagation</font> the CATIAStiDBItem in SMARTEAM.

method.name: LifeCycleNewRelease
method.abstract: <font color="green">Enables a New Release Without Propagation</font> for the CATIAStiDBItem in SmarTeam.

method.name: LifeCycleNewReleasePropagated
method.abstract: <font color="green">Enables a NewRelease action With Propagation</font> for the CATIAStiDBItem in SmarTeam.

method.name: LifeCycleRelease
method.abstract: <font color="green">Releases the CATIAStiDBItem in SmarTeam Release Vault</font>.

method.name: LifeCycleUndoCheckOut
method.abstract: <font color="green">Cancels Check-Out operation on the CATIAStiDBItem in SmarTeam</font>.

method.name: RefreshInfo
method.abstract: <font color="green">Refreshes Information concerning all CATIA Documents in session</font>.

method.name: Save
method.abstract: <font color="green">Saves the CATIAStiDBItem in SmarTeam</font>.

method.name: IntegrationType
method.abstract: Returns the Engine Integration Type.

method.name: UseGraphicalUI
method.abstract: Returns (gets) or sets the use of <font color="green">Graphical User Interface (GUI)</font> in order to display or not panels.
